reviews.review_msg: Thank you for being such a great teacher! You seem to have a gift for explaining difficult topics very well, and your passion for the subject made me enjoy it more. I really appreciate all of your help inside and outside the classroom, and I'm glad I got to take another class with you.

Best prof for bus 336!! He actually wants you to learn, lectures were easy to understand, and he provides practice exams. Real world applications in each lecture. I actually feel like I might use what I learned in this class. He uses R and Tableau. 40% of your grade are take-home assignments, and 2 midterms 25%, plus a group hackathon.
Definitely will take any other classes he teaches. Very understanding and wants students to succeed, exams were from practice papers.

Lectures are recorded and posted online after class. 2 midterms (30% each), 6 hw assignments (30% total), and ~10 in-class assignments (1% each). He does use R in this class for coding but you could always refer to his slides/lectures for help (or chatgpt).  Pretty good for a newer prof. Would take again. Class average is ~75.
